statements: SELECT * FROM historical_trade_data;
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, symbol, price FROM historical_trade_data;
SELECT trade_date, symbol, price, volume FROM historical_trade_data WHERE exchange = 'NYSE';
SELECT * FROM historical_trade_data WHERE price > 100;
SELECT trade_id, exchange, volume FROM historical_trade_data ORDER BY trade_date DESC, volume ASC;
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, symbol, price FROM historical_trade_data WHERE exchange='NYSE' ORDER BY trade_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, SUM(volume) AS total_volume FROM historical_trade_data GROUP BY symbol ORDER BY total_volume DESC;
SELECT trade_id, symbol, price FROM historical_trade_data WHERE trade_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND exchange='NASDAQ' ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT trade_id, symbol, volume FROM historical_trade_data WHERE price > 1000 AND exchange='NYSE';
SELECT trade_id, exchange, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM historical_trade_data GROUP BY exchange HAVING avg_price > 5000 ORDER BY avg_price DESC;
SELECT trade_id, trade_timestamp, trade_amount, exchange_name, symbol, trade_type FROM trade_data;
SELECT trade_id, trade_timestamp, exchange_name, symbol FROM trade_data ORDER BY trade_timestamp DESC;
SELECT trade_id, trade_amount, trade_type, exchange_name FROM trade_data WHERE trade_amount > 1000;
SELECT symbol, trade_type, trade_timestamp FROM trade_data WHERE exchange_name = 'Binance' ORDER BY trade_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM arbitrage_strategies WHERE strategy_start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND strategy_performance > 0.2 ORDER BY strategy_performance DESC;
SELECT * FROM trade_data WHERE trade_type = 'Buy' ORDER BY trade_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT trade_id, trade_amount FROM trade_data WHERE exchange_name = 'Binance' ORDER BY trade_id ASC;
SELECT symbol, trade_amount FROM trade_data WHERE trade_amount > 1000 AND exchange_name = 'Kraken' ORDER BY trade_amount DESC, trade_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT trade_id, trade_timestamp, exchange_name, symbol FROM trade_data WHERE trade_type = 'Sell' AND exchange_name = 'Coinbase' ORDER BY trade_timestamp ASC;
SELECT trade_id, trade_timestamp, symbol FROM trade_data WHERE trade_amount < 500 AND trade_type = 'Buy' ORDER BY symbol ASC, trade_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_trades;
SELECT trade_date, stock_symbol, trade_price FROM historical_trades WHERE trade_volume > 1000;
SELECT strategy_name, description FROM arbitrage_strategies;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE success_rate > 0.8;
SELECT strategy_id, average_roi FROM performance_metrics ORDER BY average_roi DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_trades ORDER BY trade_price DESC, trade_volume ASC;
SELECT trade_date, stock_symbol, trade_volume FROM historical_trades WHERE trade_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT AVG(trade_price) AS avg_price, MIN(trade_price) AS min_price, MAX(trade_price) AS max_price FROM historical_trades WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT s.strategy_name, p.date_evaluated, p.success_rate FROM arbitrage_strategies s JOIN performance_metrics p ON s.strategy_id = p.strategy_id WHERE p.success_rate >= 80;
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, stock_symbol, trade_price, trade_volume FROM historical_trades WHERE trade_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM trades ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
SELECT symbol, quantity, price FROM trades WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT symbol, price FROM trades WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY symbol ASC, order_date DESC;
SELECT name, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance < 1000;
SELECT * FROM trades WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
SELECT symbol, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM trades GROUP BY symbol HAVING total_quantity > 500 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT symbol, price FROM trades WHERE trade_date = '2022-01-15' AND quantity < 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT t.symbol, o.order_date, o.price FROM trades t JOIN orders o ON t.symbol = o.symbol WHERE t.quantity > 50 AND o.quantity < 100;
SELECT a.name, a.balance, SUM(f.fee_amount) AS total_fees FROM accounts a LEFT JOIN fees f ON a.account_id = f.order_id GROUP BY a.name, a.balance HAVING total_fees > 0 ORDER BY total_fees DESC;
SELECT * FROM TradeData;
SELECT trade_id, trade_symbol, trade_price FROM TradeData WHERE trade_volume > 1000;
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, trade_symbol FROM TradeData ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(trade_price) AS avg_price, MAX(trade_price) AS max_price FROM TradeData;
SELECT trade_symbol, trade_volume, trade_price FROM TradeData WHERE trade_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT * FROM TradeData WHERE trade_price > 100 ORDER BY trade_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT trade_symbol, trade_volume FROM TradeData WHERE trade_volume > 5000 AND trade_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT AVG(trade_price) AS avg_trade_price, MAX(trade_volume) AS max_trade_volume FROM TradeData GROUP BY trade_symbol HAVING MAX(trade_volume) > 10000;
SELECT * FROM ArbitrageOpportunities WHERE opportunity_profit > 5000 ORDER BY opportunity_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT opportunity_symbols, AVG(opportunity_profit) AS avg_profit FROM ArbitrageOpportunities GROUP BY opportunity_symbols HAVING avg_profit > 3000;
